body: I am Zac. I am TS Dev. I am best. AMA

title: AMA Zac

replies.body:
How tall are you?
Opinions on me
replies.body_tagged:
How tall are you?
Opinions on me

replies.body:
Hello Zac! 
I have seen you a couple of times in the server, and LOTS of times in the Forums. 
You are a really cool person, and moderator. 
It is really great to have you with us! 
Anyways to the questions! 

1. What is your real name? 
2. How old are you?
3. How tall are you? 
4. Opinions on me? 
5. Opinions on South Korea and Greece? 
6. What is your favorite color? 
7. Do you play sports (if so please name it)  or are you a couch potato? 
8. Do you have a crush, boyfriend/girlfriend, or are you single? 
9. What is your favorite food? 
10. What is your nationality? 

And I will make a BONUS question, because I haven't heard about you that much...

Bonus Question: How many places have you been? What is your favorite out of all places? 

I wish to hear from you soon, and I hope we can be friends. 
Until then, stay strong and hang in there! 
Thank you so much, and I hope to talk to you soon through TeamSpeak! 
See you in game!

replies.body:
The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.

Therefore the fitness gram pacer test is about how long you can last now how quickly you can do it. However the quickest I, or anyone can do it is 58 seconds because that is the second time the [ding] sound is heard and therefore if someone failed to complete a lap in the first two [ding]'s their test would be over.

The Fitness gram pacer test is my biggest hobby.

You fight over nothing and to defend the wrong people. You're not a bad guy but you're very misled and defensive.
